20101203180920.000|20101203180922.000|CCO|AMERICAN PEOPLE.
20101203180922.000|20101203180932.000|CCO|THANK YOU, DAVID PETRAEUS.
20101203180932.000|20101203180934.000|CCO|I WANT TO THANK ALL YOUR 
20101203180934.000|20101203180936.000|CCO|OUTSTANDING LEADERS WHO WELCOME 
20101203180936.000|20101203180938.000|CCO|ME HERE, INCLUDING GENERAL JOHN 
20101203180938.000|20101203180940.000|CCO|CAMPBELL.
20101203180940.000|20101203180942.000|CCO|ADMIRAL BILL McCRAVEN, FROM THE 
20101203180942.000|20101203180944.250|CCO|455th AIR EXPEDITIONARY WING.

20101203180948.750|20101203180951.000|CCO|INCLUDING COMMAND SERGEANT MAJOR
20101203180951.000|20101203180953.500|CCO|SCOTT SCHROEDER.
20101203180953.500|20101203180956.000|CCO|COMMAND SERGEANT MAJOR 
20101203180956.000|20101203180958.500|CCO|CHRISTOPHER IS, AND COMMAND 
20101203180958.500|20101203181001.000|CCO|CHIEF, CRAIG ADAMS.
20101203181001.000|20101203181003.500|CCO|I ALSO WANT TO ACKNOWLEDGE THE 
20101203181003.500|20101203181006.000|CCO|OUTSTANDING WORK THAT OUR 
20101203181006.000|20101203181008.500|CCO|CIVILIANS ARE DOING EACH AND 
20101203181008.500|20101203181011.000|CCO|EVERY DAY.
20101203181011.000|20101203181021.000|CCO|STARTEIKENBERRY, AND 
20101203181021.000|20101203181022.667|CCO|AWFUL THE CIVILENS WHO ARE HERE,
20101203181022.667|20101203181024.333|CCO|FIGHTING ALONGSIDE YOU, PUTTING 
20101203181024.333|20101203181026.000|CCO|THEMSELVES AT RISK.
20101203181026.000|20101203181027.667|CCO|THEY ARE AWAY FROM THEIR FAMILY,
20101203181027.667|20101203181029.333|CCO|AND WE ARE VERY, VERY GRATEFUL 
20101203181029.333|20101203181031.000|CCO|TO THEM AS WELL.
20101203181031.000|20101203181033.000|CCO|SO GIVE THEM A BIG ROUND OF 
20101203181033.000|20101203181035.000|CCO|APPLAUSE.
20101203181035.000|20101203181037.000|CCO|[ APPLAUSE ]
20101203181037.000|20101203181039.000|CCO|I THINK WE GOT EVERY SERVICE 
20101203181039.000|20101203181041.000|CCO|HERE TONIGHT.
20101203181041.000|20101203181051.000|CCO|WE GOT ARMY, WE'VE GOT NAVY.
20101203181051.000|20101203181101.000|CCO|WE'VE GOT AIR FORCE, AND I THINK
20101203181101.000|20101203181103.500|CCO|WE MAY HAVE A FEW MARINES AROUND
20101203181103.500|20101203181106.000|CCO|TOO.
20101203181106.000|20101203181108.500|CCO|AND A WHOLE LOT OF FOLKS FROM 
20101203181108.500|20101203181111.000|CCO|THE 101st AIRBORNE DIVISION, THE
20101203181111.000|20101203181114.333|CCO|SCREAMING EAGLES.
20101203181114.333|20101203181117.667|CCO|NOW, HERE IN AFGHANISTAN, YOU 
20101203181117.667|20101203181131.000|CCO|ARE ALL COAST GUARD.
20101203181131.000|20101203181134.333|CCO|IS THAT WHAT I HEARD?
20101203181134.333|20101203181137.667|CCO|HERE IN AFGHANISTAN, ALL OF YOU,
20101203181137.667|20101203181141.000|CCO|ARE PART OF ONE TEAM.
20101203181141.000|20101203181143.500|CCO|SERVING TOGETHER, SUCCEEDING 
20101203181143.500|20101203181146.000|CCO|TOGETHER, ACCEPT MAYBE IN NEXT 
20101203181146.000|20101203181148.500|CCO|WEEK'S ARMY-NAVY GAME.
20101203181148.500|20101203181151.000|CCO|AS YOUR COMMANDER IN CHIEF, I 
20101203181151.000|20101203181154.333|CCO|GOT TO STAY NEUTRAL ON THAT.
20101203181154.333|20101203181157.667|CCO|WE ALSO HAVE SOME ISAP PARTNERS 
20101203181157.667|20101203181201.000|CCO|HERE AS WELL.
20101203181201.000|20101203181203.000|CCO|YOU KNOW, WHEN I WAS HERE IN THE
20101203181203.000|20101203181205.000|CCO|SPRING, WE HAD A COALITION OF 43
20101203181205.000|20101203181207.000|CCO|NATIONS.
20101203181207.000|20101203181209.000|CCO|NOW, WE GOT A COALITION OF 49 
20101203181209.000|20101203181211.000|CCO|NATIONS.
20101203181211.000|20101203181213.000|CCO|AND THIS SENDS A POWERFUL 
20101203181213.000|20101203181215.000|CCO|MESSAGE, TO THE COALITION OF 
20101203181215.000|20101203181217.000|CCO|NATIONS THAT SUPPORTS 
20101203181217.000|20101203181219.000|CCO|AFGHANISTAN IS STRONG, AND HAS 
20101203181219.000|20101203181221.000|CCO|GROWN.
20101203181221.000|20101203181222.667|CCO|NOW, I'M NOT HERE TO GIVE A LONG
20101203181222.667|20101203181224.333|CCO|SPEECH.
20101203181224.333|20101203181226.000|CCO|I WANT TO SHAKE AS MANY HANDS AS
20101203181226.000|20101203181227.667|CCO|I CAN.
20101203181227.667|20101203181229.333|CCO|BUT LET ME SAY THAT, AT THIS 
20101203181229.333|20101203181231.000|CCO|TIME OF YEAR, AMERICANS ARE 
20101203181231.000|20101203181233.500|CCO|GIVING THANKS FOR ALL OF THE 
20101203181233.500|20101203181236.000|CCO|BLEGINGS THAT WE HAVE, AND AS WE
20101203181236.000|20101203181238.500|CCO|BEGIN THIS HOLIDAY SEASON, 
20101203181238.500|20101203181241.000|CCO|THERE'S NO PLACE THAT I WOULD 
20101203181241.000|20101203181243.000|CCO|RATHER BE, THAN BE HERE WITH 
20101203181243.000|20101203181245.000|CCO|YOU.
20101203181245.000|20101203181247.000|CCO|I KNOW IT'S NOT EASY FOR ALL OF 
20101203181247.000|20101203181249.000|CCO|YOU TO BE AWAY FROM HOME, 
20101203181249.000|20101203181251.000|CCO|ESPECIALLY DURING THE HOLIDAYS.
20101203181251.000|20101203181254.333|CCO|I KNOW, IT'S HARD ON YOUR 
20101203181254.333|20101203181257.667|CCO|FAMILIES, THEY'VE GOT AN EMPTY 
20101203181257.667|20101203181301.000|CCO|SEAT AT THE DINNER TABLE.
20101203181301.000|20101203181302.667|CCO|SOMETIMES, DURING THE HOLIDAY 
20101203181302.667|20101203181304.333|CCO|SEASON, THAT'S WHEN YOU FEELS 
20101203181304.333|20101203181306.000|CCO|ABSENCE OF SOMEBODY YOU LOVE 
20101203181306.000|20101203181307.667|CCO|MOST.
20101203181307.667|20101203181309.333|CCO|BUT HERE'S WHAT I WANT YOU TO 
20101203181309.333|20101203181311.000|CCO|KNOW.
20101203181311.000|20101203181312.667|CCO|AS PRESIDENTS OF THE UNITED 
20101203181312.667|20101203181314.333|CCO|STATES, I HAVE NO GREATER 
20101203181314.333|20101203181316.000|CCO|RESPONSIBILITY THAN KEEPING THE 
20101203181316.000|20101203181317.667|CCO|AMERICAN PEOPLE SECURE.
20101203181317.667|20101203181319.333|CCO|I COULD NOT MEET THAT 
20101203181319.333|20101203181321.000|CCO|RESPONSIBILITY.
20101203181321.000|20101203181323.000|CCO|WE COULD NOT PROTECT THE 
20101203181323.000|20101203181325.000|CCO|AMERICAN PEOPLE.
20101203181325.000|20101203181327.000|CCO|WE COULD NOT ENJOY THE BLESSINGS
20101203181327.000|20101203181329.000|CCO|OF OUR LIBERTY.
20101203181329.000|20101203181331.000|CCO|WITHOUT THE EXTRAORDINARY 
20101203181331.000|20101203181333.500|CCO|SERVICE THAT EACH AND EVERY ONE 
20101203181333.500|20101203181336.000|CCO|OF YOU PERFORM.
20101203181336.000|20101203181338.500|CCO|EACH AND EVERY DAY.
20101203181338.500|20101203181341.000|CCO|SO ON BEHALF OF ME, ON BEHALF OF
20101203181341.000|20101203181344.333|CCO|MICHELLE, ON BEHALF OF MALIA AND
20101203181344.333|20101203181347.667|CCO|SASHA, ON BEHALF OF MORE THAN 
20101203181347.667|20101203181351.000|CCO|300 MILLION AMERICANS, WE ARE 
20101203181351.000|20101203181353.000|CCO|HERE TO SAY THANK YOU.
20101203181353.000|20101203181355.000|CCO|WE ARE HEAR TO SAY THANK YOU.
20101203181355.000|20101203181357.000|CCO|FOR EVERYTHING THAT YOU DO.
20101203181357.000|20101203181359.000|CCO|AND I ALSO WANT IT SAY THANK YOU
20101203181359.000|20101203181401.000|CCO|TO YOUR FAMILIES BACK HOME.
20101203181401.000|20101203181411.000|CCO|SO THAT WHEN YOU TALK TO THEM, 
20101203181411.000|20101203181413.500|CCO|YOU KNOW THAT THEY KNOW -- THEY 
20101203181413.500|20101203181416.000|CCO|ARE SERVING HERE WITH YOU.
20101203181416.000|20101203181418.500|CCO|IN MIND AND SPIRIT, IF NOT IN 
20101203181418.500|20101203181421.000|CCO|BODY.
20101203181421.000|20101203181424.333|CCO|MILLIONS OF AMERICANS GIVE 
20101203181424.333|20101203181427.667|CCO|THANKS THIS HOLIDAY SEASON, JUST
20101203181427.667|20101203181431.000|CCO|AS GENERATIONS HAVE BEFORE, WHEN
20101203181431.000|20101203181433.000|CCO|THEY THINK ABOUT THE ARMED 
20101203181433.000|20101203181435.000|CCO|SERVICES.
20101203181435.000|20101203181437.000|CCO|YOU'RE PART OF AN UNBROKEN LINE 
20101203181437.000|20101203181439.000|CCO|OF AMERICANS WHO HAVE GIVEN UP 
20101203181439.000|20101203181441.000|CCO|YOUR COMFORT, YOUR EASE, YOUR 
20101203181441.000|20101203181443.000|CCO|CONVENIENCE FOR AMERICA'S 
20101203181443.000|20101203181445.000|CCO|SECURITY.
20101203181445.000|20101203181447.000|CCO|I WAS ON ANOTHER COLD DECEMBER, 
20101203181447.000|20101203181449.000|CCO|MORE THAN 200 YEARS AGO.
20101203181449.000|20101203181451.000|CCO|THEY HAD A BAND OF PATRIOTS 
20101203181451.000|20101203181453.000|CCO|HELPED TO FIND OUR NATION, 
20101203181453.000|20101203181455.000|CCO|DEFEAT AN EMPIRE.
20101203181455.000|20101203181457.000|CCO|FROM THE ICY RIVER, FIELDS OF 
20101203181457.000|20101203181459.000|CCO|EUROPE, TO THE ISLANDS IN THE 
20101203181459.000|20101203181501.000|CCO|PACIFIC.
20101203181501.000|20101203181504.333|CCO|TO THE JUNGLES OF VERY ET NAM.
20101203181504.333|20101203181507.667|CCO|HILLS OF KOREA, TO THE DESERTS 
20101203181507.667|20101203181511.000|CCO|OF IRAQ.
20101203181511.000|20101203181513.000|CCO|THOSE WHO WENT BEFORE YOU, ALSO 
20101203181513.000|20101203181515.000|CCO|FOUND THEMSELVES IN THE SEASON 
20101203181515.000|20101203181517.000|CCO|OF PEACE, SERVING IN WAR.
20101203181517.000|20101203181519.000|CCO|THEY DID IT FOR THE SAME REASON 
20101203181519.000|20101203181521.000|CCO|ALL OF YOU DO.
20101203181521.000|20101203181524.333|CCO|BECAUSE THE FREEDOM, THE 
20101203181524.333|20101203181527.667|CCO|LIBERTY, THAT WE TREASURE, 
20101203181527.667|20101203181531.000|CCO|THAT'S NOT SIMPLY A BIRTH RIGHT.
20101203181531.000|20101203181533.000|CCO|IT HAS TO BE EARNED BY THE 
20101203181533.000|20101203181535.000|CCO|SACRIFICES OF PATRIOTS.
20101203181535.000|20101203181537.000|CCO|GENERATIONS OF PATRIOTS.
20101203181537.000|20101203181539.000|CCO|MEN AND WOMEN WHO STEP FORWARD 
20101203181539.000|20101203181541.000|CCO|AND SAY, SEND ME.
20101203181541.000|20101203181543.500|CCO|SOMEBODY GOT TO DO IT.
20101203181543.500|20101203181546.000|CCO|ARE WILLING TO SERVE.
20101203181546.000|20101203181548.500|CCO|SOME WILLING TO RISK ALL, SOME 
20101203181548.500|20101203181551.000|CCO|WHO GAVE ALL TO KEEP US SAFE AND
20101203181551.000|20101203181553.500|CCO|KEEP US FREE.
20101203181553.500|20101203181556.000|CCO|IN OUR TIME, IN THIS 21st

20101203181601.000|20101203181602.667|CCO|CIRCUMSTANCING THEIR 
20101203181602.667|20101203181604.333|CCO|RESPONSIBILITIES.
20101203181604.333|20101203181606.000|CCO|YOU'VE EMBRACED YOUR 
20101203181606.000|20101203181607.667|CCO|RESPONSIBILITIES, SHOWING WHY 
20101203181607.667|20101203181609.333|CCO|THE UNITED STATES MILITARY 
20101203181609.333|20101203181611.000|CCO|REMAINS THE MOST TRUSTED 
20101203181611.000|20101203181613.500|CCO|INSTITUTION IN AMERICA.
20101203181613.500|20101203181616.000|CCO|THAT'S THE LEGACY YOUR 
20101203181616.000|20101203181618.500|CCO|GENERATION HAS FORGED DURING 
20101203181618.500|20101203181621.000|CCO|THIS DECADE OF TRIAL.
20101203181621.000|20101203181622.667|CCO|IN IRAQ, AND HERE IN 
20101203181622.667|20101203181624.333|CCO|AFGHANISTAN.
20101203181624.333|20101203181626.000|CCO|THAT'S THE LEGACY THAT YOU'RE 
20101203181626.000|20101203181627.667|CCO|CARRYING FORWARD.
20101203181627.667|20101203181629.333|CCO|AS GENERAL PETRAEUS MENTIONED 
20101203181629.333|20101203181631.000|CCO|ONE YEAR AGO, I ORDERED 
20101203181631.000|20101203181632.429|CCO|ADDITIONAL TROOPS TO SERVE IN 
20101203181632.429|20101203181633.857|CCO|THIS COUNTRY THAT WAS THE 
20101203181633.857|20101203181635.286|CCO|STAGING GROUND FOR THE 9/11 
20101203181635.286|20101203181636.714|CCO|ATTACKS.
20101203181636.714|20101203181638.143|CCO|ALL OF THOSE TROOPS NOW IN 
20101203181638.143|20101203181639.571|CCO|PLACE.
20101203181639.571|20101203181641.000|CCO|AND THANKS TO YOUR SERVICE, WE 
20101203181641.000|20101203181643.000|CCO|ARE MAKING IMPORTANT PROGRESS.
20101203181643.000|20101203181645.000|CCO|YOU ARE PROTECTING YOUR COUNTRY.
20101203181645.000|20101203181647.000|CCO|YOU'RE ACHIEVING YOUR 
20101203181647.000|20101203181649.000|CCO|OBJECTIVES.
20101203181649.000|20101203181651.000|CCO|YOU WILL SUCCEED IN YOUR 
20101203181651.000|20101203181653.500|CCO|MISSION.
20101203181653.500|20101203181656.000|CCO|WE SAID WE WERE GOING TO BREAK 
20101203181656.000|20101203181658.500|CCO|THE TALIBAN'S MOMENTUM.
20101203181658.500|20101203181701.000|CCO|THAT'S WHAT YOU'RE DOING.
20101203181701.000|20101203181703.000|CCO|YOU'RE GOING ON THE OFFENSE.
20101203181703.000|20101203181705.000|CCO|TIRED OF PLAYING DEFEND.
20101203181705.000|20101203181707.000|CCO|TARGETING THEIR LEADERS, PUSHING
20101203181707.000|20101203181709.000|CCO|THEM OUT OF THEIR STRONGHOLDS.
20101203181709.000|20101203181711.000|CCO|TODAY, WE CAN BE PROUD THAT 
20101203181711.000|20101203181713.000|CCO|THERE ARE FEWER AREAS UNDER 
20101203181713.000|20101203181715.000|CCO|TALIBAN CONTROL.
20101203181715.000|20101203181717.000|CCO|AND MORE AFGHANS, HAVE A CHANCE 
20101203181717.000|20101203181719.000|CCO|TO BUILD A MORE HOPEFUL FUTURE.
20101203181719.000|20101203181721.000|CCO|WE SAID A YEAR AGO, THAT WE'RE 
20101203181721.000|20101203181723.000|CCO|GOING TO BUILD THE CAPACITY OF 
20101203181723.000|20101203181725.000|CCO|THE AFGHAN PEOPLE, AND THAT'S 
20101203181725.000|20101203181727.000|CCO|WHAT YOU'RE DOING, MEETING OUR 
20101203181727.000|20101203181729.000|CCO|RECRUITMENT TARGETS.
20101203181729.000|20101203181731.000|CCO|TRAINING AFGHAN FORCES, 
20101203181731.000|20101203181732.667|CCO|PARTNERING WITH THOSE AFGHANS 
20101203181732.667|20101203181734.333|CCO|WHO WANT TO BUILD A STRONGER AND
20101203181734.333|20101203181736.000|CCO|MORE STABLE AND MORE PROSPEROUS 
20101203181736.000|20101203181737.667|CCO|AFGHANISTAN.
20101203181737.667|20101203181739.333|CCO|NOW, I DON'T NEED TO TELL YOU 
20101203181739.333|20101203181741.000|CCO|THIS IS A TOUGH FIGHT.
20101203181741.000|20101203181744.333|CCO|I JUST CAME FROM THE MEDICAL 
20101203181744.333|20101203181747.667|CCO|UNIT.
20101203181747.667|20101203181751.000|CCO|AND SAW OUR WOUNDED WARRIOR, PIN
20101203181751.000|20101203181754.333|CCO|SOME PURPLE HEARTS, I JUST 
20101203181754.333|20101203181757.667|CCO|TALKED TO THE PLATOON THAT LOST 
20101203181757.667|20101203181801.000|CCO|SIX OF THEIR BUDDIES.
20101203181801.000|20101203181803.500|CCO|IN A SENSELESS ACT OF VIOLENCE.
20101203181803.500|20101203181806.000|CCO|IT'S A TOUGH BUSINESS.
20101203181806.000|20101203181808.500|CCO|PROGRESS COPS SLOW.
20101203181808.500|20101203181811.000|CCO|THEY'RE GOING TO BE DIFFICULT 
20101203181811.000|20101203181814.333|CCO|DACE AHEAD.
20101203181814.333|20101203181817.667|CCO|PROGRESS COMES AT A HIGH PRICE.
20101203181817.667|20101203181821.000|CCO|SO MANY OF YOU STOOD BEFORE THE 
20101203181821.000|20101203181822.667|CCO|SOLID BATTLE CROSS.
20101203181822.667|20101203181824.333|CCO|DISPLAY OF BOOTS, RIFLE, A 
20101203181824.333|20101203181826.000|CCO|HELMET.
20101203181826.000|20101203181827.667|CCO|AND SAID GD BYE TO A FALLEN 
20101203181827.667|20101203181829.333|CCO|COMRAD.
20101203181829.333|20101203181831.000|CCO|THIS YEAR ALONE, NEARLY 100 
20101203181831.000|20101203181834.333|CCO|MEMBERS OF THE 101st HAVE GIVEN 
20101203181834.333|20101203181837.667|CCO|THEIR LAST FULL MEASURE OF 
20101203181837.667|20101203181841.000|CCO|DEVOTION.
20101203181841.000|20101203181843.500|CCO|THERE ARE FEW DAYS I DON'T SIGN 
20101203181843.500|20101203181846.000|CCO|A LETTER TO THE MILITARY FAMILY 
20101203181846.000|20101203181848.500|CCO|EXPRESSING OUR NATION'S 
20101203181848.500|20101203181851.000|CCO|GRATITUDE 'GRIEF AT THEIR 
20101203181851.000|20101203181856.000|CCO|PROFOUND SACRIFICE.
20101203181856.000|20101203181901.000|CCO|TODAY OUR THOUGHTS ARE WITH 
20101203181901.000|20101203181903.000|CCO|THOSE WHO HAVE LOST A BROTHER, 
20101203181903.000|20101203181905.000|CCO|SISTER, FRIEND, SON OR DAUGER 
20101203181905.000|20101203181907.000|CCO|WHO ARE NOT COMING HOME.
20101203181907.000|20101203181909.000|CCO|WE KNOW THEIR MEMORIES ARE NEVER
20101203181909.000|20101203181911.000|CCO|HADDED AND THEIR LIFE IS ADDED 
20101203181911.000|20101203181912.667|CCO|TO THE LIFE OF OUR NATION.
20101203181912.667|20101203181914.333|CCO|BECAUSE OF SERVICE OF THE MEN 
20101203181914.333|20101203181916.000|CCO|AND WOMEN.
20101203181916.000|20101203181917.667|CCO|BECAUSE OF THE PROGRESS WE'RE 
20101203181917.667|20101203181919.333|CCO|MAKING, YOU LOOK FORWARD TO A 
20101203181919.333|20101203181921.000|CCO|NEW PHASE THIS YEAR, BEGINNING 
20101203181921.000|20101203181922.667|CCO|OF TRANSITION TO AFGHAN 
20101203181922.667|20101203181924.333|CCO|RESPONSIBILITY.
20101203181924.333|20101203181926.000|CCO|AS WE DO, WE CONTINUE TO FORGE A
20101203181926.000|20101203181927.667|CCO|PARTNERSHIP WITH THE AFGHAN 
20101203181927.667|20101203181929.333|CCO|PEOPLE FOR THE LONG TERM.
20101203181929.333|20101203181931.000|CCO|AND WE WILL NEVER LET THIS 
20101203181931.000|20101203181933.500|CCO|COUNTRY, SERVE AS A SAFE HAVEN 
20101203181933.500|20101203181936.000|CCO|FOR TERRORISTS WHO WOULD ATTACK 
20101203181936.000|20101203181938.500|CCO|THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA 
20101203181938.500|20101203181941.000|CCO|AGAIN.
20101203181941.000|20101203181943.000|CCO|THAT WILL NEVER HAPPEN.
20101203181943.000|20101203181945.000|CCO|THIS PART OF THE WORLD IS A

20101203183702.667|20101203183704.333|CCO|GLOBAL CRISIS.

20101203184141.000|20101203184142.429|CCO|>>> SCHOOLS IN AMERICA ARE 
20101203184142.429|20101203184143.857|CCO|FALLING BEHIND THOSE IN THE 
20101203184143.857|20101203184145.286|CCO|COUNTRY.
20101203184145.286|20101203184146.714|CCO|STORY AFTER STORY THAT THE 
20101203184146.714|20101203184148.143|CCO|PUBLIC SCHOOL SYSTEM IS BROKEN 
20101203184148.143|20101203184149.571|CCO|AND IN NEED OF REPAIR.
20101203184149.571|20101203184151.000|CCO|WHAT'S GOING ON AFTER SCHOOL?
20101203184151.000|20101203184152.667|CCO|WHEN KIDS GET HOME?
